oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from James B. Owen to Sarah Bell
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Two-page letter from Pvt. James B. Owen, Co. D, 31st Ill. Inf. Regt., USA to Sarah Bell. He writes that it is a beautiful spring day and that he is still "in the land of the living." He has just received a letter from her dated March 17.; He says the letter won't be long as he has no news and requests that she sent postage for Memphis. Owen was from Brownsville, Ill. and died Sept. 3, 1863.
